name: Take Flight 2
summary: In this 1930's cartoon inspired mobile game, you'll be taking to the skies to battle new foes. Take Flight 2 is a sequel to the popular game Take Flight!, in the sequel we have added a ton of new features including joystick controls, boss fights, new pilots and planes, social features, and more! Fight off enemies, collect gears and bolts, level up, and compete in this fun endless flying mobile game.
